TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
Well I don't speak Spanish (unless fudging some Italian works )

But I *think* Dominos has online ordering (you can pay in advance)
well im in if were doing this but again we should be careful, i wouldn't want pizza for a year aw screw it gimme a bit.
*coughs* https://molo.dominos.com.mx/menu/locations.php

At the SQUAD offices:

*Knock on the door*

*Some poor dev opens the door.*

*Tidal wave of pizzas floods into the room, conpletely burying him.*

- - - Updated - - -

*coughs* https://molo.dominos.com.mx/menu/locations.php

So who wants to do it?

Order up!

ill do it just gimme a bit hay can some one barny size the address for me

woops thanks Fleet Admiralj
Additional question: do we know for sure their dev team works at the same office? the KSP website gives the same address, but it'd be bad to send it to an office where their devs actually aren't at
I think there about 30 hungry and crazed devs so order at least 15.

Additional question: do we know for sure their dev team works at the same office? the KSP website gives the same address, but it'd be bad to send it to an office where their devs actually aren't at

This is a concern (we know for a fact that some of the devs aren't even in Mexico, let alone the office...who's to say the whole team doesn't work from home?)

Additional question: do we know for sure their dev team works at the same office? the KSP website gives the same address, but it'd be bad to send it to an office where their devs actually aren't at

ohhhh good point... well its a good thing i checked back before ordering

I think there about 30 hungry and crazed devs so order at least 15.

15 large? I wonder what kind of pizza we should get? Cheese is probably the safest option.

How about 5 cheese, 5 pepperoni, and 5 whatever.

Also, remember to tell the pizza guy or gal to tell SQUAD "with compliments from the forum."
Get 'em the doodle a Kerbal on the box.

Imagine if they changed sites a few weeks ago and haven't updated the contact page, and some randomer just arriving at work gets swamped in pizzas.

*Knock knock* GUY: huh? *opens door* *pizza floods into room destroying building*

Does someone who speaks Spanish want to call and make sure the KSP devs are actually in the building?

Also, I think 15 pizzas is way too much...remember, not all of the devs are there.

So do we know if that's their office or how many of them work there if it is, and how many work abroad, if any. i mean if im going to be ordering some pizza i would like to be sure its for the right guys.
